PREFIX dcat: <http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#>
PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>

DELETE  { ?dist dcterms:description ?olddesc }
INSERT 	{ ?dist dcterms:description ?newdesc }
WHERE { 
	?dataset dcat:distribution ?dist .
	?dist dcterms:description ?olddesc .
	BIND (STRLANG(?olddesc, "en") as ?newdesc)
	FILTER (CONTAINS(?olddesc, " export of "))
	FILTER (LANG(?olddesc) = "")
}
